Total Solution

We are a syndicate of exceptionally experienced sales professionals specializing in the meetings and events market and possessing unique talents for matching the perfect venue to each meeting typeâ€”anywhere in the country. Operating as a sanctioned national sales office for numerous independent conference centers, hotels and resorts, we are proud to be recognized as a full-service, one-call resource for site selection, contract negotiation and preferred client introductions.

Total solution is a performance-based sales organization of ABPO Company, and our success requires long-term sustainable relationships forged by engaging and enhancing the connections between buyers and suppliers. We are uniquely positioned to improve business relationships beyond traditional means by unleashing the true purpose and expectations of each client.

Our team members know that your time is valuable and your meetings are important. Working with us makes every aspect of site selection, planning and program management simpler. Whether to book a program, coordinate on-site logistics or conduct multiple site visits, you and your organization can rely on Total solution to be your true meeting resource.
Featuring unsurpassed meeting facilities and services, Total solution will ensure that every meeting you host is the best ever.

Our collection of dedicated meeting venues is committed to providing the most productive, efficient and successful meeting experience possible. Our members have a shared objective: deliver the best meeting experience at the best value. We invite you to explore our website and discover the distinctions of Total solution. Please be sure to check back often, as our network members are updated consistently.
